name: Kotmale Mozzarella Cheese
description: Kotmale Mozzarella is made from 100% Sri Lankan, Fresh Cow's  milk. It is a soft, moist cheese with pliable texture and a delicate milky flavour. Contains no added flavours, colours or preservatives. Suitable for Vegetarians. Rs.50 cents from every 1L of fresh milk collected is contributed to a special welfare fund "Sarubima" focused on empowering Farmers children through education.      *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
